content: कूपकः {@--1@} A well (temporary). {@--2@} A hole, cave, cavity. {@--3@} The hollow below the loins. {@--4@} A stake to which a boat is moored. {@--5@} The mast of a ship. {@--6@} A funeral pile. {@--7@} A hole under a funeral pile. {@--8@} A leather oil-vessel. {@--9@} A rock or tree in the midst of a river. {@--10@} A boat. --पिका A stone or rock in the midst of a stream.
